website_summaries.verdict: A unique design that has its limitations, but is excellent for growing vining plants around downspouts and similar structures.
pros: Ideal for clematis, morning glory, ivy and more around downspouts
Can be modified to cover posts and poles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Needed a trellis/support for my pink jasmine and also wanted to hide a galvanized pole that we use for the shade sail. I used two of the pieces in the set and attached them to the pole with zip ties and it worked perfectly. I used black zip ties because they would be less noticeable; it would be nice if the supports came with green ones but obviously not a deal killer for me. They are sturdy and not going to bend under the weight of the vine. I even have two left for another project..............These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: james b potter

customer_reviews.title: Well made, not great documentation or hardware
customer_reviews.text: Put up 12 of these across 3 downspouts for clematis to grow Easy to paint, good sturdy wire that holds its firm. Look great up on the walls Only downside is the documentation is a pain to read (I gave up) and the amount of screws/hardware woefully inadequate. Just run to the hardware store and get your own Amended: added a photo shot with the cleamatis in August, really excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best garden investment in a long time!  Great value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Super great idea! Love these!!! First "gently" "pull" these open a bit, for easiest slip on/over drain pipes. Then "gently" squeeze them for desired "closure" giving climbing plants a lot, or little space to climb. Love how you can add one above the other to "completely" cover the entire length of drain pipe. We use three per drain pipe. The "green color" blends in nicely with the foliage. Will purchase more of these. *** IDEAS & SUGGESTIONS, could easily adapt horizontally and placed on deck rails, or around smaller trees, or a free-standing lamp post, or mail box! Have Fun, we did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy: No husband needed for installation!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. I didn't use it around my downspout, but put it on my siding to let the roses climb. It was something I was able to do on my own without help from my husband. Will probably purchase another so that we can install it around the downspout.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Way wider than the picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that these trellises are very wide. I didn't look at the dimensions before buying, and assumed that because they were shown over a downspout that they'd be only slightly wider than the downspout. Not so! I won't use them around my downspout because of that, but I will use them next to my 7" square lamp posts.
customer_reviews.author: Kokocito

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Much better made than some I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase. First one in use for several years now. Looks good. Much better made than some I've seen. Very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: will do what I need it for, but not best
customer_reviews.text: these are not easy to put together. I put them as a circle and put the other two on top. It is precarious since there is no fitting mechanism to ensure the pieces don't topple over. The pieces should fit like a secure puzzle and these don't go that extra step.
customer_reviews.author: k44993

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for what it is, but works extremely well and was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I looked for something to go around my portico posts that would support my climbing mandevilla plants. This was exactly what I needed, though I do think the price is a bit high for what it is. But it was very easy to install - I put up two on top of each other for both posts. It came with zipties, but I ended up using more of my own in addition to the ones it came with to fully secure this so it wouldn't move at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love how this worked out!
customer_reviews.text: We have this up on our gutter and the clematis is already half way up and in glorious bloom. There are separate pieces so we were able to cover the downspout by spacing them. Very pleased with the effect of this just outside out front door as a welcoming sight to visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to handle...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these! We wanted a climbing plant for our unsightly gutters on the front of our house and these were perfect! Love that they are green, thus they blend in with the plant. We did have to bend them a bit to fit properly, but they were easy to meld and have kept a good shape. They show no signs of rust or wear despite living through a full winter, spring, summer and a couple rainy months of fall. Great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great way to dress up your downspouts!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleased to discover these downspout trellises! I have installed them on downspouts in an area near my hummingbird feeders and planted the trellises with flowers to attract hummingbirds. I'm very pleased with the quality and ease of installation!
customer_reviews.author: patches-mickey

customer_reviews.title: Kinsman included the hardware for multiple types of installation.
customer_reviews.text: The trellis arrived very quickly. Four pieces enabled me to use 2 to wrap around the mailbox post and 2 stacked vertically on the gutter. I found the pieces much more sturdy and easier to install than the green mesh wire I had used originally. I would definitely recommend the product. It looks nice, is very sturdy, and so easy to put into place.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Trellis
customer_reviews.text: I purchased some extra long ties to fit around the down spout. Can't wait to see the morning glories climbing up.
customer_reviews.author: GWalker

customer_reviews.title: easy for amateurs
customer_reviews.text: I am not mechanically inclined, but these are easy to install, and they work great. We have vines growing up them successfully. It is wonderful making downspouts pretty!
customer_reviews.author: crk

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool trellis and the growies love it too. Easy as can be to install and disappears in the foliage .
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great concept!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the design. The cable ties were too short to attach the ends of the trellis, behind the gutter. There weren't enough of the longer ties to attach all four sections of the trellis together, so I will have to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Happy gardener

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Good size. Covers a lot of area. Only negative is when bending mounting loops to where I needed they broke off at the soldered spot and I had to use cable ties to attach to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Buzbee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up- can be put in many places, my vines are reaching new heights!
customer_reviews.author: Bugandbear

customer_reviews.title: A Great & Versatile product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We were going to use this on one of our downspouts but now we are considering around a tree.
customer_reviews.author: kim heck

customer_reviews.title: ... difficult to put together but it looks and works great now that it is up
customer_reviews.text: These work well but they were a little difficult to put together but it looks and works great now that it is up.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Was a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my daughter. It's winter in Wisconsin so won't be use until spring. Looks good in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Smelcer

customer_reviews.title: what a good idea
customer_reviews.text: haven't installed it yet, will wait for spring but can hardly wait
customer_reviews.author: Stevie

customer_reviews.title: Trellis
customer_reviews.text: These have worked very well. Used them on two posts for clematis. Plants have attached nicely and covered the trellis.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Great for clematis. I used it for my porch rails. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jdcsmith83

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for during my lawn scape redo.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Taal

product_meta.title: Kinsman Downspout Cover Trellis
product_meta.description: Clothe your unsightly downspouts with beautiful flowering vines. Clematis look delightful on these trellises and will come back year after year. Moon vines, morning glories and Dutchman's Pipes work well too. Four 30" green wire trellises rise 10 ft. from the ground. Can also be used back-to-back to cover a mailbox post with vines. The diameter is approximately 7" when putting 2 panels together. Mounting hardware and cable ties included. This trellis can be anchored to the wall on either side of the downspout with the enclosed hardware or you can use the included cable ties if you prefer not anchoring it to the wall. Four 30" sections in each pack
feature_bullets: Four x 30" sections in each pack
Mounting hardware and cable ties included

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
